review: Performs as advertised.  Easy to install
author: Ben Ray

review: Wow! This will change my TV viewing experience for the better!
author: Ron Flax Davidson "Ron"

review: It comes with great instructional videos.  It's easy to use and my "non-techie" husband has been able to use it from the start.  I love the fact that there is an app and you have the same buttons, plus voice search if you use your phone or tablet.  We really LOVE the "Bosh" series.
author: lee stedman

review: Great very happy with it easy to install
author: Karen A DeWalt

review: It pretty much does exactly what it says. The only issue I have is what I'm watching buffering a lot. I'm not sure if that's a issue with the stick or my internet connection.  Other then that I love it.
author: kevin McNeal

review: I am very happy with the Fire Stick.
author: Janet M Swanson

review: I love it. It was easy to install and the picture is clear. I have Amazon Prime and get to choose from so manymovies to watch. Its great. Wish I would have bought it sooner.
author: Debbie Hensley
